text: Get in Where You Fit In was released as an EP in 2007. Songs were not released off this EP. Songs were known to be including "The Letdown", and "Allow Me to Introduce Myself... Mr. Right". The EP was recorded by The White Tie Affair. ==Chart positions== Chart Position Billboard 200 # 4 Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums # 1 ==Sources== Category:2007 albums
title: Get in Where You Fit In
